00084 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_ContinueCRC(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32CRC)
00085 {
00086   orxU32          u32CRC;
00087   const orxCHAR  *pc;
00088 
00089   /* Checks */
00090   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00091 
00092   /* Inits CRC */
00093   u32CRC = _u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL;
00094 
00095   /* For the whole string */
00096   for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
00097   {
00098     /* Computes the CRC */
00099     u32CRC = sau32CRCTable[(u32CRC ^ *pc) & 0xFF] ^ (u32CRC >> 8);
00100   }
00101 
00102   /* Done! */
00103   return(u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL);
00104 }
00105 
00112 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_NContinueCRC(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32CRC, orxU32 _u32CharNumber)
00113 {
00114   orxU32          u32CRC;
00115   orxU32          u32Counter;
00116   const orxCHAR  *pc;
00117 
00118   /* Checks */
00119   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00120 
00121   /* Inits CRC */
00122   u32CRC = _u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL;
00123 
00124   /* For the whole string */
00125   for(pc = _zString, u32Counter = 0; (*pc != orxCHAR_NULL) && (u32Counter < _u32CharNumber); pc++, u32Counter++)
00126   {
00127     /* Computes the CRC */
00128     u32CRC = sau32CRCTable[(u32CRC ^ *pc) & 0xFF] ^ (u32CRC >> 8);
00129   }
00130 
00131   /* Done! */
00132   return(u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL);
00133 }

00139 static orxINLINE const orxSTRING        orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(const orxSTRING _zString)
00140 {
00141   const orxSTRING zResult;
00142 
00143   /* Non null? */
00144   if(_zString != orxNULL)
00145   {
00146     /* Skips all white spaces */
00147     for(zResult = _zString; (*zResult == ' ') || (*zResult == '\t'); zResult++);
00148 
00149     /* Empty? */
00150     if(*zResult == orxCHAR_NULL)
00151     {
00152       /* Updates result */
00153       zResult = orxSTRING_EMPTY;
00154     }
00155   }
00156   else
00157   {
00158     /* Updates result */
00159     zResult = orxNULL;
00160   }
00161 
00162   /* Done! */
00163   return zResult;
00164 }
00165 
00170 static orxINLINE const orxSTRING        orxString_SkipPath(const orxSTRING _zString)
00171 {
00172   const orxSTRING zResult;
00173 
00174   /* Non null? */
00175   if(_zString != orxNULL)
00176   {
00177     const orxCHAR *pc;
00178 
00179     /* Updates result */
00180     zResult = _zString;
00181 
00182     /* For all characters */
00183     for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
00184     {
00185       /* Is a directory separator? */
00186       if((*pc == orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_LINUX) || (*pc == orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_WINDOWS))
00187       {
00188         orxCHAR cNextChar = *(pc + 1);
00189 
00190         /* Non terminal and not a directory separator? */
00191         if((cNextChar != orxCHAR_NULL) && (cNextChar != orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_LINUX) && (cNextChar != orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_WINDOWS))
00192         {
00193           /* Updates result */
00194           zResult = pc + 1;
00195         }
00196       }
00197     }
00198   }
00199   else
00200   {
00201     /* Updates result */
00202     zResult = orxNULL;
00203   }
00204 
00205   /* Done! */
00206   return zResult;
00207 }

00213 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_GetLength(const orxSTRING _zString)
00214 {
00215   /* Checks */
00216   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00217 
00218   /* Done! */
00219   return((orxU32)strlen(_zString));

00226 static orxINLINE orxBOOL                orxString_IsCharacterASCII(orxU32 _u32CharacterCodePoint)
00227 {
00228   return((_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x80) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE);
00229 }
00230 
00235 static orxINLINE orxBOOL                orxString_GetUTF8CharacterLength(orxU32 _u32CharacterCodePoint)
00236 {
00237   orxU32 u32Result;
00238 
00239   /* 1-byte long? */
00240   if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x80)
00241   {
00242     /* Updates result */
00243     u32Result = 1;
00244   }
00245   else if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x0800)
00246   {
00247     /* Updates result */
00248     u32Result = 2;
00249   }
00250   else if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x00010000)
00251   {
00252     /* Updates result */
00253     u32Result = 3;
00254   }
00255   else if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x00110000)
00256   {
00257     /* Updates result */
00258     u32Result = 4;
00259   }
00260   else
00261   {
00262     /* Updates result */
00263     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00264   }
00265 
00266   /* Done! */
00267   return u32Result;
00268 }
00269 
00276 static orxU32 orxFASTCALL               orxString_PrintUTF8Character(orxSTRING _zDstString, orxU32 _u32Size, orxU32 _u32CharacterCodePoint)
00277 {
00278   orxU32 u32Result;
00279 
00280   /* Gets character's encoded length */
00281   u32Result = orxString_GetUTF8CharacterLength(_u32CharacterCodePoint);
00282 
00283   /* Enough room? */
00284   if(u32Result <= _u32Size)
00285   {
00286     /* Depending on character's length */
00287     switch(u32Result)
00288     {
00289       case 1:
00290       {
00291         /* Writes character */
00292         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)_u32CharacterCodePoint;
00293 
00294         break;
00295       }
00296 
00297       case 2:
00298       {
00299         /* Writes first character */
00300         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0xC0 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x07C0) >> 6));
00301 
00302         /* Writes second character */
00303         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | (_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x3F));
00304 
00305         break;
00306       }
00307 
00308       case 3:
00309       {
00310         /* Writes first character */
00311         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0xE0 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0xF000) >> 12));
00312 
00313         /* Writes second character */
00314         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x0FC0) >> 6));
00315 
00316         /* Writes third character */
00317         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | (_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x3F));
00318 
00319         break;
00320       }
00321 
00322       case 4:
00323       {
00324         /* Writes first character */
00325         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0xF0 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x001C0000) >> 18));
00326 
00327         /* Writes second character */
00328         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x0003F000) >> 12));
00329 
00330         /* Writes third character */
00331         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x00000FC0) >> 6));
00332 
00333         /* Writes fourth character */
00334         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | (_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x3F));
00335 
00336         break;
00337       }
00338 
00339       default:
00340       {
00341         /* Logs message */
00342         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Can't print invalid unicode character <0x%X> to string.", _u32CharacterCodePoint);
00343 
00344         /* Updates result */
00345         u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00346 
00347         break;
00348       }
00349     }
00350   }
00351   else
00352   {
00353     /* Logs message */
00354     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Can't print unicode character <0x%X> to string as there isn't enough space for it.", _u32CharacterCodePoint);
00355 
00356     /* Updates result */
00357     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00358   }
00359 
00360   /* Done! */
00361   return u32Result;
00362 }
00363 
00369 static orxU32 orxFASTCALL               orxString_GetFirstCharacterCodePoint(const orxSTRING _zString, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00370 {
00371   orxU8  *pu8Byte;
00372   orxU32  u32Result;
00373 
00374   /* Checks */
00375   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00376 
00377   /* Gets the first byte */
00378   pu8Byte = (orxU8 *)_zString;
00379 
00380   /* ASCII? */
00381   if(*pu8Byte < 0x80)
00382   {
00383     /* Updates result */
00384     u32Result = *pu8Byte;
00385   }
00386   /* Invalid UTF-8 byte sequence */
00387   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xC0)
00388   {
00389     /* Logs message */
00390     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: multi-byte sequence non-leading byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00391 
00392     /* Updates result */
00393     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00394   }
00395   /* Overlong UTF-8 2-byte sequence */
00396   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xC2)
00397   {
00398     /* Logs message */
00399     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: overlong 2-byte sequence starting with byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00400 
00401     /* Updates result */
00402     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00403   }
00404   /* 2-byte sequence */
00405   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xE0)
00406   {
00407     /* Updates result with first character */
00408     u32Result = *pu8Byte++ & 0x1F;
00409 
00410     /* Valid second character? */
00411     if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00412     {
00413       /* Updates result */
00414       u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte & 0x3F);
00415     }
00416     else
00417     {
00418       /* Logs message */
00419       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 2-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00420 
00421       /* Updates result */
00422       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00423     }
00424   }
00425   /* 3-byte sequence */
00426   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xF0)
00427   {
00428     /* Updates result with first character */
00429     u32Result = *pu8Byte++ & 0x0F;
00430 
00431     /* Valid second character? */
00432     if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00433     {
00434       /* Updates result */
00435       u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte++ & 0x3F);
00436 
00437       /* Valid third character? */
00438       if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00439       {
00440         /* Updates result */
00441         u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte & 0x3F);
00442       }
00443       else
00444       {
00445         /* Logs message */
00446         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 3-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00447 
00448         /* Updates result */
00449         u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00450       }
00451     }
00452     else
00453     {
00454       /* Logs message */
00455       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 3-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00456 
00457       /* Updates result */
00458       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00459     }
00460   }
00461   /* 4-byte sequence */
00462   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xF5)
00463   {
00464     /* Updates result with first character */
00465     u32Result = *pu8Byte++ & 0x07;
00466 
00467     /* Valid second character? */
00468     if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00469     {
00470       /* Updates result */
00471       u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte++ & 0x3F);
00472 
00473       /* Valid third character? */
00474       if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00475       {
00476         /* Updates result */
00477         u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte++ & 0x3F);
00478 
00479         /* Valid fourth character? */
00480         if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00481         {
00482           /* Updates result */
00483           u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte & 0x3F);
00484         }
00485         else
00486         {
00487           /* Logs message */
00488           orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 4-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00489 
00490           /* Updates result */
00491           u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00492         }
00493       }
00494       else
00495       {
00496         /* Logs message */
00497         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 4-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00498 
00499         /* Updates result */
00500         u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00501       }
00502     }
00503     else
00504     {
00505       /* Logs message */
00506       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 4-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00507 
00508       /* Updates result */
00509       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00510     }
00511   }
00512   else
00513   {
00514     /* Logs message */
00515     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: invalid out-of-bound byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00516 
00517     /* Updates result */
00518     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00519   }
00520 
00521   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00522   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00523   {
00524     /* Stores it */
00525     *_pzRemaining = (orxSTRING)(pu8Byte + 1);
00526   }
00527 
00528   /* Done! */
00529   return u32Result;
00530 }
00531 
00536 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_GetCharacterCounter(const orxSTRING _zString)
00537 {
00538   const orxCHAR  *pc;
00539   orxU32          u32Result;
00540 
00541   /* Checks */
00542   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00543 
00544   /* For all characters */
00545   for(pc = _zString, u32Result = 0; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; u32Result++)
00546   {
00547     /* Invalid current character ID */
00548     if(orxString_GetFirstCharacterCodePoint(pc, &pc) == orxU32_UNDEFINED)
00549     {
00550       /* Updates result */
00551       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00552 
00553       /* Logs message */
00554       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF8 string <%s>, can't count characters.", _zString);
00555 
00556       break;
00557     }
00558   }
00559 
00560   /* Done! */
00561   return u32Result;
00562 }

00570 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_NCopy(orxSTRING _zDstString, const orxSTRING _zSrcString, orxU32 _u32CharNumber)
00571 {
00572   /* Checks */
00573   orxASSERT(_zDstString != orxNULL);
00574   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
00575 
00576   /* Done! */
00577   return(strncpy(_zDstString, _zSrcString, _u32CharNumber));

00599 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_Duplicate(const orxSTRING _zSrcString)
00600 {
00601   orxU32    u32Size;
00602   orxSTRING zResult;
00603 
00604   /* Checks */
00605   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
00606 
00607   /* Gets string size in bytes */
00608   u32Size = (orxString_GetLength(_zSrcString) + 1) * sizeof(orxCHAR);
00609 
00610   /* Allocates it */
00611   zResult = (orxSTRING)orxMemory_Allocate(u32Size, orxMEMORY_TYPE_TEXT);
00612 
00613   /* Valid? */
00614   if(zResult != orxNULL)
00615   {
00616     /* Copies source to it */
00617     orxMemory_Copy(zResult, _zSrcString, u32Size);
00618   }
00619 
00620   /* Done! */
00621   return zResult;
00622 }

00627 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_Delete(orxSTRING _zString)
00628 {
00629   /* Checks */
00630   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00631   orxASSERT(_zString != orxSTRING_EMPTY);
00632 
00633   /* Frees its memory */
00634   orxMemory_Free(_zString);
00635 
00636   /* Done! */
00637   return orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00638 }

00680 static orxINLINE orxS32                 orxString_ICompare(const orxSTRING _zString1, const orxSTRING _zString2)
00681 {
00682   /* Checks */
00683   orxASSERT(_zString1 != orxNULL);
00684   orxASSERT(_zString2 != orxNULL);
00685 
00686 #ifdef __orxWINDOWS__
00687 
00688   /* Done! */
00689   return(stricmp(_zString1, _zString2));
00690 
00691 #else /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00692 
00693   /* Done! */
00694   return strcasecmp(_zString1, _zString2);
00695 
00696 #endif /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00697 }

00707 static orxINLINE orxS32                 orxString_NICompare(const orxSTRING _zString1, const orxSTRING _zString2, orxU32 _u32CharNumber)
00708 {
00709   /* Checks */
00710   orxASSERT(_zString1 != orxNULL);
00711   orxASSERT(_zString2 != orxNULL);
00712 
00713 #ifdef __orxWINDOWS__
00714 
00715   /* Done! */
00716   return strnicmp(_zString1, _zString2, _u32CharNumber);
00717 
00718 #else /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00719 
00720   /* Done! */
00721   return strncasecmp(_zString1, _zString2, _u32CharNumber);
00722 
00723 #endif /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00724 }

00733 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToS32Base(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32Base, orxS32 *_ps32OutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00734 {
00735   orxCHAR    *pcEnd;
00736   orxSTATUS   eResult;
00737 
00738   /* Checks */
00739   orxASSERT(_ps32OutValue != orxNULL);
00740   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00741 
00742   /* Convert */
00743   *_ps32OutValue = strtol(_zString, &pcEnd, _u32Base);
00744   
00745   /* Valid conversion ? */
00746   if((pcEnd != _zString) && (_zString[0] != orxCHAR_NULL))
00747   {
00748     /* Updates result */
00749     eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00750   }
00751   else
00752   {
00753     /* Updates result */
00754     eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
00755   }
00756 
00757   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00758   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00759   {
00760     /* Stores it */
00761     *_pzRemaining = pcEnd;
00762   }
00763 
00764   /* Done! */
00765   return eResult;
00766 }
00767 
00774 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToS32(const orxSTRING _zString, orxS32 *_ps32OutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00775 {
00776   orxSTATUS eResult;
00777 
00778   /* Checks */
00779   orxASSERT(_ps32OutValue != orxNULL);
00780   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00781 
00782   /* Hexadecimal? */
00783   if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00784   && (_zString[0] == '0')
00785   && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00786   && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'x'))
00787   {
00788     /* Gets hexa value */
00789     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString + 2, 16, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00790   }
00791   /* Binary? */
00792   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00793        && (_zString[0] == '0')
00794        && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00795        && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'b'))
00796   {
00797     /* Gets binary value */
00798     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString + 2, 2, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00799   }
00800   /* Octal? */
00801   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00802   && ((_zString[0] | 0x20) == '0'))
00803   {
00804     /* Gets octal value */
00805     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString + 1, 8, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00806   }
00807   /* Decimal */
00808   else
00809   {
00810     /* Gets decimal value */
00811     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString, 10, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00812   }
00813 
00814   /* Done! */
00815   return eResult;
00816 }
00817 
00825 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToU32Base(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32Base, orxU32 *_pu32OutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00826 {
00827   orxCHAR    *pcEnd;
00828   orxSTATUS   eResult;
00829 
00830   /* Checks */
00831   orxASSERT(_pu32OutValue != orxNULL);
00832   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00833 
00834   /* Convert */
00835   *_pu32OutValue = strtoul(_zString, &pcEnd, _u32Base);
00836   
00837   /* Valid conversion ? */
00838   if((pcEnd != _zString) && (_zString[0] != orxCHAR_NULL))
00839   {
00840     /* Updates result */
00841     eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00842   }
00843   else
00844   {
00845     /* Updates result */
00846     eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
00847   }
00848 
00849   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00850   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00851   {
00852     /* Stores it */
00853     *_pzRemaining = pcEnd;
00854   }
00855 
00856   /* Done! */
00857   return eResult;
00858 }

00867 {

00869 
00870   /* Checks */
00871   orxASSERT(_pu32OutValue != orxNULL);
00872   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00873 
00874   /* Hexadecimal? */

00876   && (_zString[0] == '0')
00877   && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00878   && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'x'))
00879   {
00880     /* Gets hexa value */
00881     eResult = orxString_ToU32Base(_zString + 2, 16, _pu32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00882   }
00883   /* Binary? */
00884   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00885        && (_zString[0] == '0')
00886        && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00887        && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'b'))
00888   {
00889     /* Gets binary value */
00890     eResult = orxString_ToU32Base(_zString + 2, 2, _pu32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00891   }
00892   /* Octal? */
00893   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00894   && ((_zString[0] | 0x20) == '0'))
00895   {
00896     /* Gets octal value */
00897     eResult = orxString_ToU32Base(_zString + 1, 8, _pu32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00898   }
00899   /* Decimal */

00916 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToFloat(const orxSTRING _zString, orxFLOAT *_pfOutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00917 {
00918   orxCHAR    *pcEnd;
00919   orxSTATUS   eResult;
00920 
00921   /* Checks */
00922   orxASSERT(_pfOutValue != orxNULL);
00923   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00924 
00925   /* Linux / Mac / GP2X / Wii / IPhone / Android / MSVC? */
00926 #if defined(__orxLINUX__) || defined(__orxMAC__) || defined(__orxGP2X__) || defined(__orxWII__) || defined (__orxIPHONE__) || defined(__orxMSVC__) || defined(__orxANDROID__)
00927 
00928   /* Converts it */
00929   *_pfOutValue = (orxFLOAT)strtod(_zString, &pcEnd);
00930 
00931 #else /* __orxLINUX__ || __orxMAC__ || __orxGP2X__ || __orxWII__ || __orxIPHONE__ || __orxMSVC__ || __orxANDROID__ */
00932 
00933   /* Converts it */
00934   *_pfOutValue = strtof(_zString, &pcEnd);
00935 
00936 #endif /* __orxLINUX__ || __orxMAC__ || __orxGP2X__ || __orxWII__ || __orxIPHONE__ || __orxMSVC__ || __orxANDROID__ */
00937 
00938   /* Valid conversion ? */
00939   if((pcEnd != _zString) && (_zString[0] != orxCHAR_NULL))
00940   {
00941     /* Updates result */
00942     eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00943   }
00944   else
00945   {
00946     /* Updates result */
00947     eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
00948   }
00949 
00950   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00951   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00952   {
00953     /* Stores it */
00954     *_pzRemaining = pcEnd;
00955   }
00956 
00957   /* Done! */
00958   return eResult;
00959 }

00967 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToVector(const orxSTRING _zString, orxVECTOR *_pvOutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00968 {
00969   orxVECTOR       stValue;
00970   const orxSTRING zString;
00971   orxSTATUS       eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
00972 
00973   /* Checks */
00974   orxASSERT(_pvOutValue != orxNULL);
00975   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00976 
00977   /* Skips all white spaces */
00978   zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(_zString);
00979 
00980   /* Is a vector start character? */
00981   if((*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_START)
00982   || (*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_START_ALT))
00983   {
00984     /* Skips all white spaces */
00985     zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString + 1);
00986 
00987     /* Gets X value */
00988     eResult = orxString_ToFloat(zString, &(stValue.fX), &zString);
00989 
00990     /* Success? */
00991     if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00992     {
00993       /* Skips all white spaces */
00994       zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString);
00995 
00996       /* Is a vector separator character? */
00997       if(*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_SEPARATOR)
00998       {
00999         /* Skips all white spaces */
01000         zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString + 1);
01001 
01002         /* Gets Y value */
01003         eResult = orxString_ToFloat(zString, &(stValue.fY), &zString);
01004 
01005         /* Success? */
01006         if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01007         {
01008           /* Skips all white spaces */
01009           zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString);
01010 
01011           /* Is a vector separator character? */
01012           if(*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_SEPARATOR)
01013           {
01014             /* Skips all white spaces */
01015             zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString + 1);
01016 
01017             /* Gets Z value */
01018             eResult = orxString_ToFloat(zString, &(stValue.fZ), &zString);
01019 
01020             /* Success? */
01021             if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01022             {
01023               /* Skips all white spaces */
01024               zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString);
01025 
01026               /* Is not a vector end character? */
01027               if((*zString != orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_END)
01028               && (*zString != orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_END_ALT))
01029               {
01030                 /* Updates result */
01031                 eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
01032               }
01033             }
01034           }
01035         }
01036       }
01037     }
01038   }
01039 
01040   /* Valid? */
01041   if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01042   {
01043     /* Updates vector */
01044     orxVector_Copy(_pvOutValue, &stValue);
01045 
01046     /* Asks for remaining string? */
01047     if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01048     {
01049       /* Stores it */
01050       *_pzRemaining = zString + 1;
01051     }
01052   }
01053 
01054   /* Done! */
01055   return eResult;
01056 }
01057 
01064 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToBool(const orxSTRING _zString, orxBOOL *_pbOutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
01065 {
01066   orxS32    s32Value;
01067   orxSTATUS eResult;
01068 
01069   /* Checks */
01070   orxASSERT(_pbOutValue != orxNULL);
01071   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01072 
01073   /* Tries numeric value */
01074   eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString, 10, &s32Value, _pzRemaining);
01075 
01076   /* Valid? */
01077   if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01078   {
01079     /* Updates boolean */
01080     *_pbOutValue = (s32Value != 0) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE;
01081   }
01082   else
01083   {
01084     orxU32 u32Length;
01085 
01086     /* Gets length of false */
01087     u32Length = orxString_GetLength(orxSTRING_FALSE);
01088 
01089     /* Is false? */
01090     if(orxString_NICompare(_zString, orxSTRING_FALSE, u32Length) == 0)
01091     {
01092       /* Updates boolean */
01093       *_pbOutValue = orxFALSE;
01094 
01095       /* Has remaining? */
01096       if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01097       {
01098         /* Updates it */
01099         *_pzRemaining += u32Length;
01100       }
01101 
01102       /* Updates result */
01103       eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
01104     }
01105     else
01106     {
01107       /* Gets length of true */
01108       u32Length = orxString_GetLength(orxSTRING_TRUE);
01109 
01110       /* Is true? */
01111       if(orxString_NICompare(_zString, orxSTRING_TRUE, u32Length) == 0)
01112       {
01113         /* Updates boolean */
01114         *_pbOutValue = orxTRUE;
01115 
01116         /* Has remaining? */
01117         if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01118         {
01119           /* Updates it */
01120           *_pzRemaining += u32Length;
01121         }
01122 
01123         /* Updates result */
01124         eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
01125       }
01126     }
01127   }
01128 
01129   /* Done! */
01130   return eResult;
01131 }

01137 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_LowerCase(orxSTRING _zString)
01138 {
01139   orxCHAR *pc;
01140 
01141   /* Checks */
01142   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01143 
01144   /* Converts the whole string */
01145   for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
01146   {
01147     /* Needs to be converted? */
01148     if(*pc >= 'A' && *pc <= 'Z')
01149     {
01150       /* Lower case */
01151       *pc |= 0x20;
01152     }
01153   }
01154 
01155   return _zString;
01156 }
01157 
01162 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_UpperCase(orxSTRING _zString)
01163 {
01164   orxCHAR *pc;
01165 
01166   /* Checks */
01167   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01168 
01169   /* Converts the whole string */
01170   for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
01171   {
01172     /* Needs to be converted? */
01173     if(*pc >= 'a' && *pc <= 'z')
01174     {
01175       /* Upper case */
01176       *pc &= ~0x20;
01177     }
01178   }
01179 
01180   return _zString;
01181 }

01245 static orxINLINE orxS32                 orxString_SearchCharIndex(const orxSTRING _zString, orxCHAR _cChar, orxU32 _u32Position)
01246 {
01247   orxS32          s32Result = -1;
01248   orxS32          s32Index;
01249   const orxCHAR  *pc;
01250 
01251   /* Checks */
01252   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01253   orxASSERT(_u32Position <= orxString_GetLength(_zString));
01254 
01255   /* For all characters */
01256   for(s32Index = _u32Position, pc = _zString + s32Index; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++, s32Index++)
01257   {
01258     /* Found? */
01259     if(*pc == _cChar)
01260     {
01261       /* Updates result */
01262       s32Result = s32Index;
01263 
01264       break;
01265     }
01266   }
01267 
01268   /* Done! */
01269   return s32Result;
01270 }

01277 static orxINLINE orxS32 orxCDECL        orxString_Print(orxSTRING _zDstString, const orxSTRING _zSrcString, ...)
01278 {
01279   va_list stArgs;
01280   orxS32  s32Result;
01281 
01282   /* Checks */
01283   orxASSERT(_zDstString != orxNULL);
01284   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
01285 
01286   /* Gets variable arguments & print the string */
01287   va_start(stArgs, _zSrcString);
01288   s32Result = vsprintf(_zDstString, _zSrcString, stArgs);
01289   va_end(stArgs);
01290 
01291   /* Done! */
01292   return s32Result;
01293 }

01301 static orxINLINE orxS32 orxCDECL        orxString_NPrint(orxSTRING _zDstString, orxU32 _u32CharNumber, const orxSTRING _zSrcString, ...)
01302 {

01308   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);

01313   va_end(stArgs);
01314 
01315   /* Done! */
